message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a great deal, considering the value it can bring to your life.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $18000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer. I'm proposing a price of $19500. This is a fair compromise, considering the value the product can bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet us in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $18500?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll reduce the price by another $250, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair value for the product. I'm proposing a price of $19250. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my costs.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $18500, as I mentioned earlier. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll reduce the price by another $100, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair value for the product. I'm proposing a price of $19150. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my costs. If this doesn't work out, I'll have to consider other options.
